czlab.jasal

Class XData

  • java.lang.Object
    • czlab.jasal.XData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, java.io.Serializable

    public class XData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Disposable
    Wrapper structure to abstract a piece of data which can be a file or a memory byte[], String or some object. By default the data is transient and will be purged unless delete is set to false.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
